casebody.data:
JONES
v.
LAKE HICKORY R.V. RESORT. No. 113A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 25, 2004. Michael W. Clark, Bruce W. Berger, Raleigh, for Jones.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of August 2004 by Defendant to deem brief timely filed:

*882"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of August 2004."
